title: Toews' goal in OT gives Blackhawks 1-0 win over Lightning
text: BING NEWS: Jonathan Toews scores in OT to down Lightning The Chicago Blackhawks really kicked up the ... One thing to consider with Tampa Bay is the situation in goal.
